item.title: Colophon
item.description: Website This website was built with the following technologies. blogdown Hugo Theme The Hugo theme in use is cocoa enhanced. Hosting Hosting is provided through netlify. Simple instructions for getting setup can be found within Chapter 3.1 of the blogdown book/site.

item.title: About
item.description: This is the personal website and blog of Curtis Alexander. In time I hope to develop a regular writing, and thus posting, habit. The content on the site will be something I wish to share and I hope others will benefit from. It may even develop a particular audience and niche if I am so lucky. But more importantly I am interested in what happens to one who writes regularly. What would be the personal benefit — most notably in one’s thinking patterns — of regularly writing for a period of weeks, months, and even years?

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! + Hello World! x 5 R writeLines("Hello World!") for (i in rep("Hello World!", 5)) { writeLines(i) } library(purrr) rep("Hello World!", 5) %>% walk(writeLines) Python # Python 3 print("Hello World!") for i in range(5): print("Hello World!") from toolz import pipe pipe("Hello World!\n", lambda i: i * 5, print) SAS data _null_; file stdout ; put "Hello World!"; run; data _null_; file stdout ; do i = 1 to 5; put "Hello World!

item.title: Home
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env bash echo 'blah' | \ tr 'ah' 'lo' | \ sed -e 's/^[a-z]/H/' | \ awk '{n=split($0,a,""); for (i in a) {if (a[i]=="H") print i " " a[i] "e"; else print i " " a[i];} print n+1 " " "!"}' | \ sort | \ cut -d' ' -f2 | \ paste -s -d '\0' -
